sentence.Network_en: A good toolbox is a handy thing to have in any house.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何一个家庭都应备有一个好的工具箱以便随时使用.

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, hierarchical trees are one of the most inappropriately used controls in the toolbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 遗憾的是, 层次树也是工具箱中最容易被错误使用的控件之一.

sentence.Network_en: An available Neural Network Toolbox ( NNT ) in MATLAB, however, solves the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 而MATLAB软件提供了一个现成的神经网络工具箱 ( NeuralNetwork Toolbox, 简称NNT ), 为解决这个难题提供了便利条件.
